Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Diane Ticks!
Reviews.Content: I just wanted the very basic phone I could find; small - not 'smart' or suited for text or I-net, and this is absolutely perfect for me!!!  Definitely worth the money - in fact buy a couple; disconnect the house phone service, and keep one in your house as well as the car.  Heck - buy 3; one for the house - one to stay in the car, and one for your purse or pocket and you've got all you need for making calls.

ProductInfo.Features:
No contract Sprint cell phone ready to activate on Sprint wireless
Excellent Conditioned Pre-Owned Phone, You Will Be Very Satisfied
Used no contract Sprint Cell Phone
Full 30 day customer satisfaction warranty
Please contact us with any questions and we will reply ASAP
